short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ALL THE MOST POPULAR APPS IN ONE PLACE

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of searching for your most popular apps you use on a daily basis?
Use our extension to open a new tab and use our shortcuts to all the apps you need mostly.

The new tab embeds a search bar. Search features are provided by Microsoft Bing. No changes to your browser default search settings will be made.

By installing TOPAPP extension, you agree to the User Terms and the Privacy Policy elaborated on Weave Innovative website:
User Terms: https://weave-innovative.com/terms-of-service/
Privacy Policy: https://weave-innovative.com/privacypolicy/

All images on the website and extension are royalty free.
